```{r, echo = FALSE}
load('./ggplot_workshop/data/data.Rdata')
library(ggplot2)
library(ggthemes)
library(knitr)
opts_chunk$set(cache=FALSE, warning = FALSE, message = FALSE)
```

## Scatter plot: Population vs Stores
```{r, eval=FALSE}
ggplot(
  aes(x = XXXX, y = XXXX),
  data = summary2005) +
  geom_point()
```

```{r, echo = FALSE, fig.margin = TRUE, fig.cap = "Population vs Stores"}
ggplot(aes(x = population, y = stores), data = summary2005) + geom_point() + theme_few()
```

## Scatter Plot: Add regression line
```{r, eval=FALSE}
ggplot(
  aes(x = population, y = stores), 
  data = summary2005) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_XXXX()
```

```{r, echo = FALSE, fig.margin = TRUE, fig.cap = "Population vs Stores"}
ggplot(aes(x = population, y = stores), data = summary2005) + geom_point() + geom_smooth() + theme_few()
```

## Bubble plot: Bubble size represents market_share
```{r, eval=FALSE}
ggplot(
  aes(x = population, y = stores,
      XXXX = market_share),
  data = summary2005) +
  geom_point()
```

```{r, echo = FALSE, fig.margin = TRUE, fig.cap = "Bubble plot"}
ggplot(aes(x = population, y = stores, size = market_share), data = summary2005) + geom_point() + theme_few()
```
